Three different sizes. The large size in particular should appear detailed and not pixelated.

For the following, the emoji colors should not change.
The monkey should be colored, the sheep should be black outlined with a white body, etc.

red text: 🙉😻🐑🍼🍲😍

rotated emoji: 🙉😍
green text: 😻🍼
purple bg: 🐑🍲

For the following, each emoji should appear in two different colors.
Color swatches should not be visible.
